description: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /personal-unarranged-account-overdraft)```. **FamilyType**: ```Adiantamento a Depositantes```  This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/619413903/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DA+Adiantamento+a+Depositantes+-+v1.0.1). <Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /personal-unarranged-account-overdraft endpoint"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/client-implementation/open-data/v1/unarranged-account-overdraft/personal-unarranged-account-overdraft"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /personal-unarranged-account-overdraft)```. **FamilyType**: ```Adiantamento a Depositantes```  This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/619413903/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DA+Adiantamento+a+Depositantes+-+v1.0.1). The path can be chosen by the client.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"page","description":"Número da página que está sendo requisitada (o valor da primeira página é 1).","schema":{"format":"int32","default":1,"maximum":2147483647,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"},{"name":"page-size","description":"Quantidade total de registros por páginas.","schema":{"format":"int32","default":25,"maximum":1000,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
